title: Episode 2: Near Victories
description: Shankar Vedantam explores "almosts" and "not quites" on this episode of the Hidden Brain podcast, with the help of Monica Wadhwa, Dan Pink, and country music singer Kacey Musgraves.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
